Name: Pomme et Sureau
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: POUR first 2 ingredients into ice-filled glass, TOP with soda and lightly stir.
Review: Light, long and refreshing apple and elderflower.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly. The name is French for 'apple and elderflower'.
Nutrition: One serving of Pomme et Sureau contains 224 calories
